title: Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition, GPS Outdoor Watch, Solar Charging Capabilities, Surfing Features, Tracback Routing, Bells Beach 45 MM
descriptions:
### Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition: Your Ultimate Companion for Every Wave and Adventure

**Dive into the Ultimate Surfing Experience with Solar-Powered Performance!**

Introducing the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition – the ultimate GPS outdoor watch designed specifically for the adventurous soul who lives for the thrill of the waves. This sleek and robust timepiece is not just a watch; it’s your all-in-one tool for surfing, windsurfing, and kiteboarding, powered by the sun to keep you going no matter how long your session lasts.

#### **Solar Charging Capabilities**
- **Unlimited Battery Life in Smartwatch Mode**: With just 3 hours of 50,000 lux sunlight per day, the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition can last indefinitely in smartwatch mode.
- **Up to 48 Hours in GPS Mode**: Continuous solar charging (50,000 lux) extends your battery life up to 48 hours, ensuring you never miss a beat during your most intense sessions.

#### **Surfing Features**
- **Wave Counter**: Track the number of waves you catch to measure your session’s success.
- **Max Speed Tracking**: Know your top speed and push your limits.
- **Distance Tracking**: Monitor the distance you cover in the water.
- **Tide Data**: Stay informed about tide conditions to plan your sessions effectively.

#### **Windsurfing and Kiteboarding Features**
- **GPS Position Tracking**: Keep track of your position and movement on the water.
- **Speed Measurement**: Accurate speed data to optimize your performance.
- **Distance Measurement**: Monitor the distance you travel.
- **Heart Rate Monitoring**: Stay in the zone with real-time heart rate data.
- **Elevation Data for Jumps**: Track your jumps and analyze your airtime.

#### **Smart and Connected**
- **Surfline Sessions**: Sync your sessions with Surfline for detailed insights and analysis.
- **Smart Notifications**: Stay connected with notifications from your smartphone.
- **Connect IQ**: Customize your watch with apps, widgets, and data fields from the Garmin Connect IQ Store.

#### **Preloaded Activity Profiles**
- **Running, Biking, Swimming, Strength Training**: Whether you’re hitting the trails, cycling through the city, swimming in the ocean, or hitting the gym, the Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition is ready for every activity.

#### **Advanced Navigation and Health Monitoring**
- **3-Axis Compass and Barometric Altimeter**: Navigate with precision and track changes in elevation.
- **Multi-Satellite System Support (GPS, GLONASS, Galileo)**: Get accurate positioning data, even in challenging conditions.
- **Heart Rate, Sleep, Pulse Ox, and Respiration Tracking**: Monitor your health and recovery with comprehensive data.

#### **Durable and Rugged Design**
- **100-Meter Water Rating**: Dive deep without worry.
- **Thermal and Shock Resistance**: Built to withstand extreme conditions.
- **Fiber-Reinforced Polymer Case**: Lightweight and durable.
- **Scratch-Resistant Corning Gorilla Glass**: Protect your screen from scratches and impacts.

#### **Size and Style**
- **45 MM Case**: The perfect size for a balance of style and functionality.

### **Why Choose the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition?**
- **Endless Power**: Solar charging ensures you never run out of battery, even on the longest days.
- **Comprehensive Features**: From surfing to windsurfing, and everything in between, this watch has you covered.
- **Smart Integration**: Stay connected and informed with smart notifications and app compatibility.
- **Durable Build**: Designed to withstand the toughest conditions, whether you’re in the water or on land.

**Ready to take your surfing and outdoor adventures to the next level? Get the Garmin Instinct 2 Solar, Surf-Edition today and experience the ultimate in performance and style!**
